name: learn-typeorm
description: ![Typescript](/ts.jpg)  **Typescript**  is a *superset* of Javascript. A language building up on Javascript. ### About Typescript:  - Adds new Features & advantages to Javascript.  - Browser can't execute it.  - Typescript is a powerful compiler which is used to compile your `ts` code to `js` code.  - Features are compiled to Js workarounds.  - It also adds `type` which results in less error prone code.
author: Tushar Roy
